text: Irina Khechanovi (born 3 December 2000), known by her stage name Iru, is a Georgian singer. She was a member of the girlband Candy, who won the Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2011. Iru later represented Georgia at the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song "Echo". She placed 12th in the second semi- final and did not qualify for the final. == Sources == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Singers from Georgia (country)
title: Iru
